articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Syrian President
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic.
					 The message extended warm congratulations to Bashar Al-Assad and the friendly Syrian government and people on the 54th anniversary of the March 8 revolution in Syria.
					
					 The March 8 revolution was a historic event of great significance in the struggle of the Syrian people for defending the independence and security of the country and achieving the economic development and social progress under the leadership of the Baath Arab Socialist Party of Syria, the message said.
					
					 It once again extended firm support and solidarity to the Syrian government and people in their just struggle for frustrating the aggression and challenges of the hostile forces and defending the sovereignty and territorial integrity of the country.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK FM Rejects Press Statement of UNSC
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK FM Rejects Press Statement of UNSC
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Wednesday gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA as regards the fact that the U.S. and its vassal forces are moving to take issue with the ballistic rocket launching drill staged by the Korean People's Army (KPA):
					 The ballistic rocket launching drill conducted by the Hwasong artillery units of the Strategic Force of the KPA this time is a routine one to resolutely frustrate the ever more undisguised nuclear war racket of the U.S. and other hostile forces and honorably defend the security of the country and nation.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces kicked off the joint military maneuvers aimed at a preemptive nuclear strike against the DPRK only to push the situation to the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					 It is a just self-defensive right of a sovereign state to keep highly alert as required by the grim situation in which an actual war may break out anytime and to consolidate powerful deterrence in every way to mercilessly wipe out the aggressors.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. and other hostile forces are openly conducting the drills for a real war aimed at a preemptive nuclear strike against the DPRK by mobilizing lots of strategic assets and armed forces. They let the UN Security Council release a press statement, labeling KPA's routine drill as "threat". It is a brigandish act like a thief crying "stop thief!"
					
					 The DPRK categorically rejects the press statement of the UNSC as it wantonly violated sovereign state's rights to self-defence.
					
					 It is the unanimous view of the fair-minded international community that the largest-ever nuclear war drills launched by the U.S. in league with the south Korean puppet forces are the root cause of pushing the DPRK to take the toughest action.
					
					 The DPRK has already clarified several times that the joint military drills are potentially dangerous as they will wreck peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and screw up regional tensions. So, it filed complaint with the UNSC against the war games this time, too.
					
					 How to deal with the complaint and the ill-intended maneuvers of the U.S. and its vassal forces will be a marked occasion for the UNSC to show the international community whether the UNSC regarding it as its mission to preserve global peace and security fulfils its responsibility or not.
					
					 As already clarified, the KPA will reduce the bases of aggression and provocation to ashes with its invincible Hwasong rockets tipped with nuclear warheads and reliably defend the security of the country and its people's happiness in case the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces fire even a single bullet at the territory of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will certainly preserve its peace and security with its own efforts and positively contribute to protecting global peace and security.

articles.title: Congratulations to Sudanese First Vice-President and PM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Sudanese First Vice-President
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to First Vice-President of Sudan Bakri Hassan Saleh upon his appointment as prime minister.
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the prime minister and the government of Sudan success in their work for peace, stability and economic development of the country.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Revolutionary Martyr O Jin U Marked
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Revolutionary Martyr O Jin U Marked
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Central Youth Hall Tuesday to mark the 100th birth anniversary of revolutionary martyr O Jin U.
					 O Jin U was born into a poor peasant's family on March 8, Juche 6 (1917).
					
					 After embarking on the road of the revolution in his teens, he worked as a member of the Children's Vanguard and the Anti-Japanese Self-defence Corps and later was admitted into the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army. Under the warm loving care shown by President Kim Il Sung, he grew up to be a commanding officer of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and fully displayed matchless sacrificing spirit and bravery in the hard-fought anti-Japanese war for the liberation of the country. 
					
					 Upholding the line on building the party, state and the army set forth by Kim Il Sung after the liberation of the country, he devoted himself to the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the regular armed forces and their development. 
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War, he, as a commanding officer of a combined force of the Korean People's Army, led the unit to annihilate enemies through skilled operations and command, thus making a great contribution to the victory in the war.
					
					 He held important posts as vice-minister of National Defence, president of Kim Il Sung Military University, minister of the People's Armed Forces and first vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 He reliably protected with arms the party and the leader and worked hard for the reunification and prosperity of the country. 
					
					 The meeting was attended by Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Myong Su, Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho, Director of the Party History Institute of the WPK Central Committee Kim Jong Im, officials of party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, bereaved families, officials of institutions and industrial establishments and persons of merit in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Ri Myong Su, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chief of the KPA General Staff, said in his report that the revolutionary life of O Jin U was a brilliant one of a true revolutionary who defended the idea and guidance of the Party and the leader with arms and dedicated his all to the victory of the cause of the Juche revolution and the cause of the Songun revolution and showed in practice how one should hold the illustrious leaders in high esteem.
					
					 The reporter stressed that the gem-like loyalty and traits as a revolutionary displayed by O Jin U in upholding President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il with clean conscience would be always remembered by the service personnel and civilians of the country along with the victorious advance of the Korean revolution.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Bust of Revolutionary Martyr O Jin U
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Bust of Revolutionary Martyr O Jin U
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the bust of revolutionary martyr O Jin U at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Wednesday, the 100th anniversary of his birth.
					 Seen standing before the bust was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Ri Myong Su, O Su Yong, Choe Pu Il, Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho, Kim Jong Im, director of the Party History Institute of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, the Cabinet, ministries and national institutions and bereaved family members.
					
					 Placed before the bust were wreaths in the names of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Also placed there were wreaths in the names of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, ministries and national institutions and party and power bodies in Pyongyang and bouquets.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of O Jin U.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark Int'l Women's Day
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark Int'l Women's Day
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday, the 107th March 8 International Women's Day.
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affaires Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho, Hong Son Ok, secretary general of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Jang Chun Sil, chairman of the Central Committee of the women's union, women officials, women workers and members of the women's union in Pyongyang.
					
					 Present there on invitation were overseas Korean women staying in the homeland, women of foreign embassies and missions of the international organizations here and foreign guests.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae made a report.
					
					 The reporter extended warm salute and congratulations to the women across the country on March 8 International Women's Day upon authorization by Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The Korean women's movement is the Juche-oriented one as it was pioneered and has traversed the road of proud development under the guidance of the great leaders and the great Party.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, with a deep insight into the importance of the issue of women in carrying out the cause of the revolution, gave an origin to the Juche-oriented Korean women's movement in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and opened a new history of the movement by providing its glorious tradition.
					
					 Thanks to the loving care and trust of leader Kim Jong Il the Korean women could bloom as flowers of families, life and country by fully displaying their energies and enthusiasm even in the unprecedentedly trying days of history.
					
					 Today the Korean women's movement is greeting the greatest heyday in its development under the leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The country is shedding its rays as a harmonious great socialist family and a single-mindedly united power. Such stirring reality would be unthinkable without the Korean women's noble virtues and traits.
					
					 No women in the world are as proud and happy as the Korean women who enjoy a dignified life, holding Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche and having Kim Jong Un at the helm of the revolution.
					
					 The reporter called on the women to creditably fulfill their honorable responsibility and duty in the drive for achieving the victorious advance of the Korean women's movement and accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution, holding aloft the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Samjiyon Band Gives Performance to Mark International Women's Day
articles.content:
Samjiyon Band Gives Performance to Mark International Women's Day
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe gave a performance "Song in Praise of Women in Songun Era" at the East Pyongyang Grand Theater on Wednesday, the 107th March 8 International Women's Day.
					 Put on the stage of the performance that started with the prelude "Women Are Flowers" were colorful numbers including women quintet "Song of Women", music "Who Ever Taught Me?" and women sextet "Song of Coast Artillerywomen."
					
					 The performers successfully represented the boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who pursued the politics of prioritizing and respecting the women in the country and let the Korean women exalt their dignity.
					
					 Kayagum solo "Arirang at Jiansanfeng" praised the undying exploits anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk performed by setting an example in devotedly defending Kim Il Sung, true to his revolutionary leadership, and bringing about the rosy future of prospering socialist Korea.
					
					 Some numbers praising the Korean women for successfully raising their children as successors to the revolution who would carve out the future of the country revved up the festive mood.
					
					 Music "We Art the Happiest in the World" and mixed sextet "The Dear Name Called by People" helped the audience cherish higher pride and honor of having respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as the father of the great family under socialism.
					
					 Among the audience were women officials, women workers and members of the women's union in Pyongyang.

articles.title: 2017 AFC Women's Football Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
2017 AFC Women's Football Day Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- An event took place in the DPRK to mark the AFC Women's Football Day-8 March 2017.
					 Present there were women coaches and teachers from different sports teams, juvenile sports schools and Pyongyang International Football School and former women football stars.
					
					 After watching a video clip on the 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup, the participants had a football match, divided into two teams.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Equatorial Guinea Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Equatorial Guinea Appointed
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Tong Chol Ho was appointed as DPRK ambassador to the Republic of Equatorial Guinea, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
 Sariwon, March 8 (KCNA) -- Wang Jae Sin, a woman living in Taesong-dong, Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, greeted her centenarian birthday.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to her.
					
					 Wang was deeply moved by his kindness of sending birthday spread to an ordinary old woman.
					
					 Born into a poor peasant's family in Yonsan County in North Hwanghae Province before Korea's liberation, she was subject to the sorrow of being a member of the stateless nation and all sorts of humiliation and contempt after losing her parents in her early days under the Japanese imperialist colonial rule.
					
					 She could live a genuine life only after President Kim Il Sung liberated the country. She worked hard as an agricultural worker to live up to the benevolence shown by the Party and the leader who put forward farmers as owners of land and masters of the country.
					
					 Even after becoming a pensioner she kept herself busy with work.

articles.title: Newspapers Congratulate Women on March 8 International Women's Day
articles.content:
Newspapers Congratulate Women on March 8 International Women's Day
Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Leading papers here Wednesday dedicate editorials to the 107th March 8 International Women's Day. 
					They say that the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people send warm congratulations and militant salute to all the women who have performed immortal feats in the worthwhile struggle for building a socialist power by fully demonstrating their revolutionary stamina.
					
					An editorial of Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					President Kim Il Sung gave an origin to the Juche-oriented Korean women's movement in the flames of the anti-Japanese war in his early years and leader Kim Jong Il wisely led the women to firmly preserve its tradition. This served as a fundamental source that encouraged the Korean women to powerfully push one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot and leave a clear mark in the history of building a rich and powerful country.
					
					The service personnel and people ushered in the Chollima era racing against time despite debris after the war, brought about a great heyday of the era of the Workers' Party by dynamically raising the hot wind of speed campaign and opened up a new era of building a socialist power through a great revolutionary upswing. This history of their heroic struggle is associated with the precious sweat and blood shed by the women.
					
					It is the highest honor and pride of the Korean women that they have performed such admirable feats under the warm loving care, trust and leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					The future of our country is immensely rosy and bright as it has such fine women who have creditably fulfilled their mission and duty before their families and the society with noble personality and spiritual and moral traits.
					
					Minju Joson says the Korean women are proud and blessed women who have glorified the tradition of the Juche-oriented women's movement and recorded the history of victory and glory as they held the peerlessly great men in high esteem generation after generation.
					
					The country is highly proud of having faithful, sincere, staunch, upright and passionate Korean women as they perform heroic exploits in the drive for building a socialist power and bring vigor and dynamism to the great socialist family with warm love and affection, single-mindedly trusting and following their Party and leader only, notes the paper.

articles.title: Conservative Group of South Korea Is Bound to Go Ruin: Leading Newspapers of DPRK
articles.content:
Conservative Group of South Korea Is Bound to Go Ruin: Leading Newspapers of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- It is an inevitability of history that the south Korean conservative group is bound to fall into a bottomless pitfall of ruin, say leading newspapers of the DPRK Wednesday.
					 Wretched, indeed, was the plight of the traitors who had gone desperate to escalate confrontation with the compatriots after betraying the nation, Rodong Sinmun says in an article, adding:
					
					 The April 19 Popular Uprising toppled the Syngman-Rhee regime and the "yusin" regime met its miserable end as a result of the fierce October resistance for democracy in south Korea.
					
					 The June Popular Resistance and the strong waves of public campaign for democratization that swept south Korea with the resistance as a momentum toppled the "Fifth Republic" and "Sixth Republic" ruled by harsh military dictatorial regimes. Later, the "civilian government" and "pragmatic government" were all buried in the grave of history for their hideous crimes.
					
					 South Koreans of various circles are now all out to give vent to their pent-up wrath and grudge in the same spirit as displayed when they brought the country-sellers and dictators to justice. 
					
					 Public mindset reflects justice and those going against it are bound to be buried at the grave of history.
					
					 With no last-ditch effort can the puppet group of traitors escape their doom already sealed.
					
					 No force can arrest the fierce struggle being waged by south Koreans to give vent to their pent-up grudge against the Park Geun Hye regime, angered by its hideous crimes.
					
					 Minju Joson says in a commentary although the ultra-right conservative forces are getting desperate in their challenge to the ever stronger public actions of the people from all walks of life against Park, it is no more than the last-ditch efforts of the conservatives fated to go to their doom.
					
					 To eliminate the puppet conservative forces is a shortcut to achieving new politics, new life and new society in south Korea, the commentary stresses.

articles.title: Minju Joson Ridicules Traitor Park Geun Hye's Wretched Plight
articles.content:
Minju Joson Ridicules Traitor Park Geun Hye's Wretched Plight
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Those of the "Liberal Korea Party" are pressurizing Park Geun Hye by "advising" her to "resign" before impeachment, not content with expelling pro-Park members from the party and branding them as targets of elimination by "suspending their party membership."
					 Minju Joson Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The coteries of the "Liberal Korea Party," who did anything for the sake of the old witch of Chongwadae, is now busy saving their lives from the quagmire in disregard of Park's plight. This is indeed ridiculous but what is more miserable and pitiful is the plight of traitor Park who became an outcast.
					
					 Although there is no one left to console the sad old witch, the U.S. which she has served as her master is regretfully disregarding her.
					
					 Pitiful, indeed, is Park's position as her support base has collapsed and she is pressurized to step down herself every day even by her coteries on whom she has to depend. 
					
					 She fell into the pit she dug for another.
					
					 The old witch will be forced to go to a jail and grave for her thrice-cursed crimes as demanded by the public candlelight actions.

articles.title: South Korean Body Denounces Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
South Korean Body Denounces Joint Military Drills
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Pusan Action Headquarters for Forcing the Park Geun Hye Regime to Step Down held a press conference outside the puppet navy operation command in Pusan on Monday, where it denounced the north-targeted joint military drills with the U.S., according to the south Korean paper Nodong and Segye.
					 Terrible war games have been annually staged in Pusan, the speakers said, adding nothing has changed despite the regime change in the U.S.
					
					 The joint military drills only escalate confrontation on the Korean peninsula and reduce the south Korean people to cannon fodder for carrying out the U.S. strategy for dominating Asia, they charged, and went on:
					
					 Imperialism can never change its nature by itself and only actions of the peace-loving popular masses concerned of the future can defuse the danger of war.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Demand Impeachment of Traitor Park Geun Hye and Halt to THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Demand Impeachment of Traitor Park Geun Hye and Halt to THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held a rally outside the south Korean consulate general in Los Angeles on March 4 in demand of impeachment of traitor Park Geun Hye and halt to THAAD deployment in south Korea, according to online newspaper of Koreans in the U.S. Minjok Thongsin.
					 A statement was read out at the rally.
					
					 The statement said the all-people action that started in south Korea in protest against Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal reached its 19th round that day.
					
					 The motion on impeachment of Park was passed through the "National Assembly" and those of the privileged class and tycoons involved in the scandal were put in custody as a result of strong public candlelight action, the statement recalled, adding:
					
					 However, those involved in the illegal interference in "state affairs" are denying their crimes and extension of the special investigation and began to run wild again, working hard for the deployment of THAAD.
					
					 Judges of the "Constitutional Court" should respond to the demand of the public for reviving social justice by deciding on the motion on impeaching Park.
					
					 The statement called for detaining Park, urged the NA to carry on the special investigation and voiced opposition to THAAD deployment in south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted articles on a website on Feb. 13 and 23 to praise the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The website said in an article titled "Kim Jong Il, 5th anniversary of the awarding of the title of DPRK Generalissimo to him":
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il had a wealth of knowledge about the military field from his early years.
					
					 He started his Songun revolutionary leadership at the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army and always paid deep attention to the work for boosting its political, ideological, military and technical capabilities.
					
					 What merits a special attention in his Songun leadership is that he led the acute DPRK-U.S. nuclear confrontation to a shining victory.
					
					 Korea was once subject to distress as a stateless nation for the lack of even matchlocks to speak of. But the DPRK is now demonstrating before the world its might as a world military power possessed of strong nuclear deterrence. This is the greatest exploit performed by HE Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The website stressed in an article titled "February of great Paektusan nation, Proclamation of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism" that Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and proclaimed it as the supreme programme of the Party to model the whole society on Kimilsungism. He was the master of ideas and theories and peerlessly great man who illuminated the road to be followed by the global cause of independence, it added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included meetings, seminars, receptions and book and photo exhibitions in Bangladesh, Bulgaria and Britain from Feb. 8 to 14.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and pictures showing the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books and photos introducing the successes registered by the Korean people.
					
					 The secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and projected it as the guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 He strengthened and developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an ever-victorious, iron-willed party and the Korean People's Army into an invincible army.
					
					 Personages of the Bulgarian Communists Union and other political parties and organizations stressed that Kim Jong Il defended Korean-style socialism with a treasured sword of Songun and worked heart and soul to put an end to the tragedy of national division caused by foreign forces.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain said that the successes made in the DPRK would be unthinkable without Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership.
					
					 A congratulatory message and letter to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Bulgaria and Britain.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked in Pakistan, Cambodia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked in Pakistan, Cambodia
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- Meetings and seminars took place in Pakistan and Cambodia from Feb. 8 to 16 to mark the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association said that Kim Jong Il's birth marked a great event of the Korean nation and a historic event which firmly guaranteed the succession to the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 The chairman of the Pakistani Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il had long assisted President Kim Il Sung in his work, adding that he wisely led the overall affairs of the party, state and army, led the acute DPRK-U.S. nuclear confrontation to a shining victory and turned the DPRK into an impregnable fortress and military power.
					
					 The chairman of the Lahore organization for the study of the Juche idea in Pakistan praised Kim Jong Il as the genuine patriot and people's father who dedicated his all to the country and its people.
					
					 The chief editor of the Cambodian newspaper Pracheachon stressed that the Korean people firmly defended the country's sovereignty and brought about a fresh turning point in building a socialist power thanks to the guidance of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Nepalese Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Nepalese Newspaper
 Pyongyang, March 8 (KCNA) -- The full text of the New Year Address made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was carried by the Feb. 28th issue of the Nepalese paper Sremik.
					 The paper edited his photo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente sirio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente sirio
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 8 un mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					En ocasion del 54o aniversario de la Revolucion del 8 de Marzo en Siria, extiendo las calurosas felicitaciones a Vd. y al gobierno y pueblo amistosos de vuestro pais.
					
					La Revolucion del 8 de Marzo fue un acontecimiento historico de gran significado en la lucha del pueblo sirio por defender la independencia y la seguridad del pais y lograr el desarrollo economico y el progreso social bajo la direccion del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe (BAAS).
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para enviar de nuevo el apoyo y solidaridad firmes a la lucha justa del gobierno y el pueblo sirios por frustrar la agresion y los desafios de las fuerzas hostiles y defender la soberania y la integridad territorial del pais.

articles.title: Vocero de MINREX de RPDC rechaza comunicado de Consejo de Seguridad de ONU
articles.content:
Vocero de MINREX de RPDC rechaza comunicado de Consejo de Seguridad de ONU
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por un reportero de la ACNC en relacion con que EE.UU. y sus satelites intentan cuestionar el entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohetes balisticos del Ejercito Popular de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 8 la siguiente respuesta:
					El reciente disparo de cohetes balisticos de las unidades artilleras Hwasong de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC es el ejercicio normal del ejercito coreano para frustrar rotundamente las cada vez mas crecientes maniobras de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles y para defender con honor la seguridad de la patria y la nacion.
					
					Ahora, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos libraron al fin y al cabo los ejercicios conjuntos militares para dar el golpe preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC perturbando la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y llevando la situacion al borde de guerra nuclear.
					
					Deviene el legitimo derecho autodefensivo de un Estado soberano mantener el estado de alerta de acuerdo con la demanda de la situacion tan aguda que puede convertirse en cualquier momento en la guerra real y fortalecer por todos los medios el poderoso disuasivo para aniquilar despiadadamente a los agresores.
					
					Pero, EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles desarrollaron abiertamente los ejercicios de guerra real para dar ataque preventivo nuclear a la RPDC movilizando incontables propiedades estrategicas y colosales efectivos, por una parte y por la otra, instigo al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU a publicar un comunicado acusando descaradamente de una "amenaza" los ejercicios normales del EPC.
					
					Rechazamos totalmente el comunicado del CS de la ONU que violo flagrantemente el derecho de autodefensa de un Estado soberano.
					
					La sociedad internacional evalua unanimemente que el simulacro nuclear de gran envergadura de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos es la causa raigal que hace a la RPDC a tomar las medidas superintransigentes.
					
					Ya hemos aclarado en varias ocasiones la peligrosidad de los ejercicios conjuntos militares que destruyen la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y agravan la situacion de la region de la region y, esta vez tambien, hemos acusado al respecto ante el CS de la ONU.
					
					La actitud del CS de la ONU que se tomaran respecto a la acusacion de la RPDC y el movimiento malsano de EE.UU. y sus satelites servira del motivo para mostrar claramente ante la sociedad internacional el hecho de que esa organizacion internacional, que tiene como su mision el aseguramiento de la paz y la seguridad internacionales, cumple o no con su responsabilidad asumida.
					
					Como ya aclarado, nuestro ejercito exterminara totalmente con los canones Hwasong cargados con ojivas nucleares todas las bases principales de la agresion y la provocacion, si EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos lanzan siquiera una chispa pequena contra el territorio donde se ejerce la soberania de la RPDC, de manera que defendera confiablemente la seguridad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					Salvaguardemos sin falta con nuestra fuerza propia la paz y la seguridad de nuestro Estado y contribuiremos activamente a la preservacion de la paz y la estabilidad del mundo.

articles.title: Tuvo lugar acto central por centesimo cumpleanos de O Jin U
articles.content:
Tuvo lugar acto central por centesimo cumpleanos de O Jin U
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en la Casa Central de la Juventud el acto central por el centesimo cumpleanos del martir revolucionario O Jin U.
					O Jin U nacio el 8 de marzo del 6(1917) de la Era Juche en una pobre familia campesina.
					
					El, quien emprendio a la tierna edad de 10 y tantos anos la revolucion, ingreso a la Guerrilla Popular Antijaponesa tras pasar las carreras de Vanguardia Infantil y el Destacamento de Autodefensa Antijaponesa, se hizo como comandante del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea bajo el amor cordial y solicitud del Presidente Kim Il Sung y manifesto plenamente el espiritu de sacrificio y la bravura incomparables en la enconada lucha antijaponesa por la liberacion de la patria.
					
					Despues de liberacion de la patria, lucho con abnegacion por la fundacion y el desarrollo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares en acato a la linea de la construccion del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, presentada por el Presidente.
					
					En el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, aporto mucho a la victoria de guerra siendo comandante de la unidad combinada del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					En el periodo posguerra, el se encargo del viceministro de Defensa Nacional, el rector de la Academia Militar General Kim Il Sung, el ministro de Fuerzas Armadas Populares y el primer vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y otros cargos importantes y lucho por defender a ultranza al Partido y al Lider y lograr la reunificacion y la prosperidad del pais.
					
					En el acto participaron Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Myong Su, el vicepremier Jon Kwang Ho, la directora del Instituto de Historia del Partido del CC de PTC, Kim Jong Im, los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido y las fuerzas armadas, las entidades de masas, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los familiares de O Jin U, los funcionarios de los organos, empresas y fabricas de esta capital y los benemeritos.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC, Ri Myong Su, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, quien dijo:
					
					La vida revolucionaria de O Jin U fue la vida brillante de un verdadero revolucionario quien dedico todo lo suyo por defender con fusiles la idea y la orientacion del partido y el lider y lograr la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, y mostro mediante sus practicas como debe enaltecer y apoyar a su lider.
					
					La sinceridad y los rasgos de revolucionarios de O Jin U, infinitamente fiel al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, brillaran para siempre junto con la marcha victoriosa de la Revolucion Coreana y eternizaran en la mente de todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el pueblo.

articles.title: Efectuado acto central por el Dia Internacional de la Mujer
articles.content:
Efectuado acto central por el Dia Internacional de la Mujer
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 107o aniversario del Dia Internacional de la Mujer (8 de marzo).
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, el vicepremier Jon Kwang Ho, Hong Son Ok, secretaria general del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Jang Chun Sil, presidenta de CC de la Union Socialista de Mujeres de Corea y las funcionarias, trabajadoras y miembros de la USMC de esta capital.
					
					Fueron invitadas las coreanas residentes en ultramar, de visita en la patria, las mujeres de las representaciones diplomaticas y de organizaciones internacionales en la RPDC y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Ryong Hae.
					
					Por el encargo de Kim Jong Un, Presidente del PTC y del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, el informador envio el cordial saludo y la felicitacion a las mujeres de todo el pais con motivo del Dia Internacional de la Mujer.
					
					Senalo que el movimiento de las mujeres coreanas es el autoctono, iniciado y recorrido por el camino de desarrollo orgulloso bajo la direccion de gran lider y el gran partido.
					
					Al percatarse de la importancia del problema de la mujer en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria, el Presidente Kim Il Sung dio origen del movimiento autoctono de las mujeres coreanas en el fragor de la lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa y abrio nueva historia del movimiento femenino creando la tradicion orgullosa, apunto y continuo:
					
					Gracias al amor y la confianza del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, las mujeres coreanas demostraron sin reserva sus fuerzas y pasion siendo flores de la familia, la vida y el pais aun en los dias de pruebas sin precedentes en la historia.
					
					Hoy en dia, gracias a tener al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, el movimiento femenino de Corea acoge una era dorada de su desarrollo.
					
					Al margen de nobles virtudes y bellos rasgos de las mujeres, no se puede pensar en la realidad orgullosa de la patria que brilla como una gran familia armoniosa del socialismo y la potencia de la unidad monolitica.
					
					En este mundo no hay las mujeres tan felices como las coreanas que bajo la direccion del Maximo Dirigente gozan de vida digna enalteciendo como eterno Sol del Juche al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					El informador exhorto a levantar en alto la bandera de la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y cumplir con su responsabilidad y deber honrosos en la lucha por impulsar victoriosamente el movimiento de mujeres coreanas y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche, bajo la direccion del Maximo Dirigente.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC en Guinea Ecuatorial
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC en Guinea Ecuatorial
Pyongyang, 8 de marzo (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Tong Chol Ho fue nombrado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC en la Republica de Guinea Ecuatorial.
